text: Farewell, My Lovely is a 1975 British American crime mystery thriller movie directed by Dick Richards and is the third adaption of the novel of the same name by Raymond Chandler. It stars Charlotte Rampling, John Ireland, Robert Mitchum, Sylvia Miles (in her Oscar nominated role), Anthony Zerbe, Harry Dean Stanton, Joe Spinell, Sylvester Stallone and Ivor Danvers and was produced by ITC Entertainment and distributed by Avco Embassy Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1975 crime movies Category:1975 mystery movies Category:1975 thriller movies Category:1970s crime thriller movies Category:1975 LGBT movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:British mystery movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:ITC Entertainment movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American crime movies
title: Farewell, My Lovely (1975 movie)
